name: The Legend Of Aubiria
description:
In  the  distant land of Aubiria, super powers are holy and people manipulating them are respected, however not everyone  seek for them for the common good...

Meet Aganor and Wildric,, two masters of telekinesis. As Wildric is emprisonned in the depths of a castle, Aganor comes for his rescue. They should solve toghether some puzzles of this labyrinthic castle to get out of it. Will they succeed?

------

CONTROL

R: Restart

B: interact

Right mouse button: throw

Left mouse button : attract

1:  switch to the first charachter

2: switch to the second one

space: jump

------

This is just a prototype to test how the mechanics work, it is not polished at all
